cab.content: Of) *?ti h 6This Document is the Property ofJ /His Britannic Majesty^ Cov^ernrnent.Military secret. 1440 From Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, to Secretary of State 6081 ^ for India, 22nd November 1920. 836 F.R. Waziristan. On 20th November a representative jirga of all sectionsWana Wazirs at Sarwekai accepted terms. They have promised to bring in300 Government rifles, 250 tribal rifles and 40,000 in cash or kind. They have askedfor 20 days' grace.
